page.title: 18A Child's Day.
page.content: I wake up at about 7:30am, and get up at 8:00am. Two friends call for me at 8:50am and we walk to school together. At school the whistle is blown and we walk in.We start with "Hey-Maths!" I am on Tulip book. Later we have an assembly with our headmaster.He tells us a story from the Bible and we sing a hymn.We walk back to our classrooms and continue until 10:30am when we have morning playtime. After play we do topic work until 12:15pm which is when we have our lunch. I have school dinners so I go into the hall for first sitting. We go back to class at 1:15pm. We have P.E. in the hall; after that we do topics or something else until story time at 2:40pm. I walk home at 3:10pm. When I get home I relax and have a drink, then I watch t.v. until tea at 5:00pm. I go to Guides from 7:15pm until 9:00pm.
